section.title: Frequent Questions
section.description: Quick answers to help you plan your procurement.

items.question: What products do you manufacture?
items.answer: We specialize in converted paper products, including custom-sized rolls, slit rolls, and industrial packaging paper.

items.question: What is your typical lead time?
items.answer: Lead times vary by volume and specs, but we generally fulfill standard orders within 5-7 business days.

items.question: Can I order custom sizes?
items.answer: Absolutely. We offer flexible slitting and resizing services to meet your exact machinery requirements.

items.question: Do you have quality certifications?
items.answer: Yes, we maintain rigorous internal quality control standards and source from certified suppliers.
